product_name: Eagle Creek Dane Convertible Brief - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Eagle Creek Dane is a briefcase that can be carried with a shoulder strap, grab handle or backpack straps. It also safely carries your laptop in a checkpoint-friendly design. Checkpoint-friendly suspended laptop compartment with butterfly-style opening fits up to a 17 in. laptop; laptop remains protected during security screening. Eagle Creek Dane offers 3 carry options: padded concealable backpack straps, removable shoulder strap and padded grab handle. Travel-focused interior organization includes an electronics pocket, a zippered mesh pocket, pen slots and key fob; also includes 2 pockets for electronic chargers/cords. Secure-zip toggle closure on organizer compartment prevents zipper from being easily unzipped; 2-way lockable zippers on main and laptop compartments. Quick-grab front zip pocket; reflective highlights. Back slip panel allows secure stacking on wheeled luggage. Coated polyester fabric and zippers provide an exceptionally durable and weather-resistant barrier that can be easily cleaned. Closeout.
short_description: The Eagle Creek Dane is a briefcase that can be carried with a shoulder strap, grab handle or backpack straps. It also safely carries your laptop in a checkpoint-friendly design.
